entries.name: entities
entries.desc: name is the name of the doctype #external_id is the referenced DTD, if given

entries.name: external_id
entries.desc: name is the name of the doctype #external_id is the referenced DTD, if given

entries.name: name
entries.desc: name is the name of the doctype #external_id is the referenced DTD, if given

entries.name: namespaces
entries.desc: name is the name of the doctype #external_id is the referenced DTD, if given

entries.name: notation(name)
entries.desc: Retrieves a named notation. Only notations declared in the internal DTD subset can be retrieved.

entries.name: notations()
entries.desc: This method returns a list of notations that have been declared in the internal DTD subset. Notations in the external DTD subset are not listed.

entries.name: public()
entries.desc: This method retrieves the public identifier identifying the document's DTD.

entries.name: system()
entries.desc: This method retrieves the system identifier identifying the document's DTD
